data.author: Lee Pearson
data.quote: I'm a gay disabled man who has become very successful. I don't get up in the morning and think I'm inspirational; I just get up thinking that I love horses.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: Sound character provides the power with which a person may ride the emergencies of life instead of being overwhelmed by them. Failure is... the highway to success.

data.author: Albert Camus
data.quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.

data.author: Charlie Sheen
data.quote: As kids we're not taught how to deal with success; we're taught how to deal with failure. If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. If at first you succeed, then what?

data.author: Henri Frederic Amiel
data.quote: Everything you need for better future and success has already been written. And guess what? All you have to do is go to the library.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

data.author: Tracy Chapman
data.quote: I never assumed I would have that commercial success, so it was a total surprise. And honestly, I never assumed that it would ever happen again.

data.author: Lionel Messi
data.quote: You cannot allow your desire to be a winner to be diminished by achieving success before and I believe there is room for improvement in every sportsman.

data.author: Herbert Kaufman
data.quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage 'coaches' ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.

data.author: Colin Morgan
data.quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.

data.author: Thomas Merton
data.quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.

data.author: John McDonald
data.quote: To enjoy enduring success we should travel a little in advance of the world.

data.author: David Spade
data.quote: Success? You can't get a big head about it. When people stare at me, they could be whispering to their friend, 'That guy sucks! Have you seen him before? He's horrible.'

data.author: Robert Schumann
data.quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs.

data.author: James Dyson
data.quote: Enjoy failure and learn from it. You can never learn from success.

data.author: Kathy Ireland
data.quote: I believe there are three keys to success. For me it is keeping my priorities in order: It's my faith and my family, and then the business.

data.author: Rupert Murdoch
data.quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.

data.author: Michael Bergdahl
data.quote: Wal-Mart's success strategies and tactics are easy to understand yet hard to duplicate.

data.author: Morihei Ueshiba
data.quote: Create each day anew.

data.author: Thomas J. Watson
data.quote: You can be discouraged by failure, or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes, make all you can. Because, remember that's where you'll find success - on the far side of failure.
